# LeafProperty.ProcessorInfoAndFeatures.Features.EIST property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

Enhanced Intel SpeedStep® technology. A value of true indicates the processor supports this technology.

Key Composition

* Leaf: ProcessorInfoAndFeatures
* Property: EIST
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean

```csharp
public static IPropertyKey EIST { get; }
```
